displayName.japanese: 戦場のヴァルキュリア

description.english: Obtained all achievements.
description.french: Tous les exploits accomplis.
description.italian: Ottenuti tutti gli obiettivi.
description.japanese: 全ての実績を獲得済み
description.russian: Obtained all trophies.
description.spanish: Has obtenido todos los logros.

description.english: Obtained all decorations.
description.french: A obtenu toutes les décorations.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutte le onorificenze.
description.japanese: すべての勲章を手に入れた。
description.russian: Obtained all decorations.
description.spanish: Has obtenido todas las condecoraciones.

description.english: Completed Chapter 4, and won the battle of Siegval.
description.french: A terminé le ch. 4 et remporté la bataille de Siegval.
description.german: Kapitel 4 beendet und die Schlacht von Siegval gewonnen.
description.italian: Hai completato il cap. 4 e vinto la Battaglia di Siegval.
description.japanese: 4章をクリアし、ジークヴァル会戦に勝利した。
description.russian: Completed Chapter 4, and won the battle of Siegval.
description.schinese: 完成第4章，赢得齐格瓦尔会战的胜利。
description.spanish: Has completado el cap. 4 y has ganado la batalla de Siegval.
description.tchinese: 完成第4章，在齊格瓦爾會戰中取得勝利。

description.english: Completed Chapter 7, and rendezvoused with the Centurion.
description.french: A terminé le ch. 7 et rejoint le Centurion.
description.german: Kapitel 7 beendet und die Centurion erreicht.
description.italian: Hai completato il cap. 7 e incontrato la Centurion.
description.japanese: 7章をクリアし、巡洋艦センチュリオンと合流した。
description.russian: Completed Chapter 7, and rendezvoused with the Centurion.
description.schinese: 完成第7章，与百夫长号巡洋舰会合。
description.spanish: Has completado el cap. 7 y has llegado hasta el Centurión.
description.tchinese: 完成第7章，和巡洋艦百夫長號會合。

description.english: Completed Chapter 11, and made it past the Sea Fortress.
description.french: A terminé une histoire d'escadron pour la première fois.
description.german: Kapitel 11 beendet und die Seefestung überwunden.
description.italian: Hai completato il cap. 11 e superato la Fortezza del Mare.
description.japanese: 11章をクリアし、海上要塞を突破した。
description.russian: Completed Chapter 11, and made it past the Sea Fortress.
description.schinese: 完成第11章，突破海上要塞。
description.spanish: Has completado el cap. 11 y has superado la Fortaleza del Mar.
description.tchinese: 完成第11章，突破海上要塞。

displayName.spanish: Un motivo por el que luchar

description.english: Completed Chapter 15, and defeated both Walz and Crymaria.
description.french: A terminé le ch. 15 et vaincu Walz et Crymaria.
description.german: Kapitel 15 beendet und Walz und Crymaria besiegt.
description.italian: Hai completato il cap. 15 e sconfitto sia Walz che Crymaria.
description.japanese: 15章をクリアし、ヴォルツとクライマリアを撃退した。
description.russian: Completed Chapter 15, and defeated both Walz and Crymaria.
description.schinese: 完成第15章，击退沃尔兹和克莱玛丽亚。
description.spanish: Has completado el cap. 15 y has derrotado a Walz y Crymaria.
description.tchinese: 完成第15章，擊退沃爾茲和克萊瑪麗亞。

description.english: Completed Chapter 17, and witnessed the end of the war.
description.french: A terminé le ch. 17 et assisté à la fin de la guerre.
description.german: Kapitel 17 beendet und das Ende des Krieges miterlebt.
description.italian: Hai completato il cap. 17 e assistito alla fine della guerra.
description.japanese: 17章をクリアし、終戦を迎えた。
description.russian: Completed Chapter 17, and witnessed the end of the war.
description.schinese: 完成第17章，迎来战争的终结。
description.spanish: Has completado el cap. 17 y has presenciado el fin de la guerra.
description.tchinese: 完成第17章，迎來戰爭的終結。

description.english: Completed Chapter 18, and ended Belgar's dark ambitions.
description.french: A terminé le ch. 18 et mis fin au sombre plan de Belgar.
description.german: Kapitel 18 beendet und Belgars Machenschaften vereitelt.
description.italian: Hai completato il cap. 18 e messo fine alle ambizioni di Belgar.
description.japanese: 18章をクリアし、ベルガーの野望を阻止した。
description.russian: Completed Chapter 18, and ended Belgar's dark ambitions.
description.schinese: 完成第18章，阻止伯格的野心。
description.spanish: Has completado el cap. 18 y has puesto fin al plan de Belgar.
description.tchinese: 完成第18章，阻止伯格的野心。

description.english: Kept your promise with Riley Miller.
description.french: A honoré la promesse faite à Riley Miller.
description.italian: Hai mantenuto la promessa fatta a Riley Miller.
description.japanese: レイリィとの誓いを果たした。
description.russian: Kept your promise with Riley Miller.
description.spanish: Has cumplido lo prometido a Riley Miller.

description.english: Defeated an enemy ace for the first time.
description.french: A tué un soldat d'élite ennemi pour la première fois.
description.german: Das erste Mal einen Elitegegner besiegt.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto un asso nemico per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて敵エースユニットを撃破した。
description.russian: Defeated an enemy ace for the first time.
description.schinese: 初次击破敌方王牌单位。
description.spanish: Has derrotado a un As enemigo por primera vez.
description.tchinese: 初次擊破敵方王牌單位。

description.english: Defeated 15 enemy aces.
description.french: A tué 15 soldats d'élite ennemis.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 15 assi nemici.
description.japanese: 敵エースユニットを15体撃破した。
description.russian: Defeated 15 enemy aces.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a 15 Ases enemigos.

description.english: Defeated 1000 enemy units.
description.french: A tué 1 000 unités ennemies.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto 1000 unità nemiche.
description.japanese: 敵ユニットを1000体撃破した。
description.russian: Defeated 1000 enemy units.
description.spanish: Has derrotado a 1000 unidades enemigas.

description.english: Rescued 10 allies in critical condition.
description.french: A sauvé 10 alliés dans un état critique.
description.italian: Hai soccorso 10 alleati in condizioni critiche.
description.japanese: 瀕死の味方を10回救出した。
description.russian: Rescued 10 allies in critical condition.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a 10 aliados en condición crítica.

description.english: Watched all event scenes.
description.french: A regardé toutes les cinématiques.
description.italian: Hai guardato tutti gli episodi.
description.japanese: すべてのイベントを閲覧した。
description.russian: Watched all event scenes.
description.spanish: Has visto todos los eventos.

description.english: Completed a squad story for the first time.
description.french: A terminé une histoire d'escadron pour la première fois.
description.italian: Hai completato una storia d'unità per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて隊員断章をクリアした。
description.russian: Completed a squad story for the first time.
description.spanish: Has completado la historia de un escuadrón por primera vez.

description.english: Recruited all squad members.
description.french: A recruté tous les membres de l'escadron.
description.italian: Hai reclutato tutti i membri dell'unità.
description.japanese: すべての隊員が入隊した。
description.russian: Recruited all squad members.
description.spanish: Has reclutado a todos los miembros del escuadrón.

description.english: Used R&D Facility for the first time.
description.french: A utilisé le complexe R&D pour la première fois.
description.german: Zum ersten Mal die F&E-Anlage benutzt.
description.italian: Hai usato la R&S per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて研究開発所で開発を行った。
description.russian: Used R&D Facility for the first time.
description.schinese: 第一次在研究开发所进行项目开发。
description.spanish: Has usado I+D por primera vez.
description.tchinese: 第一次在研究開發所進行開發。

description.english: Obtained all infantry weapons.
description.french: A obtenu toutes les armes d'infanterie.
description.italian: Hai acquisito tutte le armi di fanteria.
description.japanese: すべての歩兵装備を手に入れた。
description.russian: Obtained all infantry weapons.
description.spanish: Has obtenido todas las armas de infantería.

description.english: Developed the Hafen into a heavy tank.
description.french: A amélioré le Hafen en char lourd.
description.german: Den Hafen zu einem schweren Panzer ausgebaut.
description.italian: Hai sviluppato l'Hafen in un corazzato pesante.
description.japanese: ハーフェン号が重戦車の状態となるまで開発を行った。
description.koreana: 하펜 호가 중전차 상태가 될 때까지 개발했다.
description.russian: Developed the Hafen into a heavy tank.
description.schinese: 开发海芬号，将其武装成重型坦克。
description.spanish: Has convertido el Hafen en un tanque pesado.
description.tchinese: 把海芬號開發到重戰車狀態。

description.english: Obtained all tank parts.
description.french: A obtenu toutes les pièces du char.
description.italian: Hai acquisito tutte le parti del corazzato.
description.japanese: すべての戦車装備を手に入れた。
description.russian: Obtained all tank parts.
description.spanish: Has obtenido todas las piezas para tanques.

displayName.spanish: El arma secreta de la Federación

description.english: Obtained all ship parts.
description.french: A obtenu toutes les pièces de navire.
description.italian: Hai acquisito tutte le parti della nave.
description.japanese: すべての艦体開発を行った。
description.russian: Obtained all ship parts.
description.schinese: 完成所有舰船开发项目。
description.spanish: Has obtenido todas las piezas para barcos.

description.english: Learned an order at the Mess Hall for the first time.
description.french: A appris un ordre au mess pour la première fois.
description.german: Das erste Mal einen Befehl in der Kantine erlernt.
description.italian: Hai imparato il tuo primo ordine nella mensa.
description.japanese: 初めてサロンでオーダーを習得した。
description.russian: Learned an order at the Mess Hall for the first time.
description.schinese: 初次在休息处学会命令。
description.spanish: Has aprendido una orden en la cantina por primera vez.
description.tchinese: 初次在休息處習得命令。

description.english: Learned all orders.
description.french: A appris tous les ordres.
description.italian: Hai imparato tutti gli ordini.
description.japanese: すべてのオーダーを習得した。
description.russian: Learned all orders.
description.spanish: Has aprendido todas las órdenes.

description.english: One of your squadmates was promoted to Corporal.
description.french: Un membre de votre escadron a été promu caporal.
description.german: Ein Mitglied deiner Truppe wurde zum Unteroffizier befördert.
description.italian: Uno dei tuoi compagni d'unità è stato promosso a Caporale.
description.japanese: いずれかの隊員の階級が「伍長」になった。
description.russian: One of your squadmates was promoted to Corporal.
description.schinese: 任一名队员的军衔达到“下士”。
description.spanish: Uno de tus compañeros de escuadrón ha sido ascendido a Cabo.
description.tchinese: 任何一名隊員的軍銜達到「下士」。

description.english: One of your classes was promoted to Elite status.
description.french: Une de vos classes a été promue au rang d'élite.
description.german: Eine deiner Klassen hat Elitestatus erhalten.
description.italian: Una delle tue classi ha raggiunto il rango Élite.
description.japanese: いずれかの兵科が「猟兵」になった。
description.russian: One of your classes was promoted to Elite status.
description.spanish: Uno de tus compañeros ha sido ascendido a élite.
description.tchinese: 任何一名隊員的兵科升格為「獵兵」。

description.english: One of your classes was promoted to Paragon status.
description.french: Une de vos classes a été promue au rang de parangon.
description.german: Eine deiner Klassen hat Vorbildstatus erhalten.
description.italian: Una delle tue classi ha raggiunto il rango Perfezione.
description.japanese: いずれかの兵科が「精鋭猟兵」になった。
description.russian: One of your classes was promoted to Paragon status.
description.schinese: 任一兵种的晋升为“精锐猎兵”。
description.spanish: Uno de tus compañeros ha sido ascendido a soldado modelo.
description.tchinese: 任何一名隊員的兵科升格為「精銳獵兵」。

description.english: All of your classes were upgraded to max level.
description.french: Toutes vos classes ont atteint le niveau maximum.
description.german: Alle deine Klassen wurden auf Maximalstufe gebracht.
description.italian: Tutte le tue classi hanno raggiunto il livello massimo.
description.japanese: すべての兵科のレベルが最大になった。
description.russian: All of your classes were upgraded to max level.
description.schinese: 所有兵种达到最高等级。
description.spanish: Todos tus compañeros han alcanzado el nivel máximo.
description.tchinese: 所有兵科升級到最高等級。

description.english: Earned 1,000,000 DCT cumulatively.
description.french: A obtenu plus de 1 000 000 DCT.
description.italian: Hai guadagnato più di 1.000.000 DUC.
description.japanese: 累計入手金額が1,000,000DCTを超えた。
description.russian: Earned 1,000,000 DCT cumulatively.
description.schinese: 累积获得总金额超过1,000,000达。
description.spanish: Has obtenido más de 1 000 000 DCT.

description.english: Obtained an A rank on a mission for the first time.
description.french: A obtenu le rang A à la fin d'une mission pour la première fois.
description.german: Zum ersten Mal Rang A in einer Mission erreicht.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il rango A in una missione per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めてミッションをSランクでクリアした。
description.russian: Obtained an A rank on a mission for the first time.
description.spanish: Has obtenido el rango A en una misión por primera vez.

description.english: Obtained A ranks on 20 missions.
description.french: A obtenu le rang A à la fin de 20 missions.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il rango A in 20 missioni.
description.japanese: 20個のミッションをSランクでクリアした。
description.russian: Obtained A ranks on 20 missions.
description.spanish: Has obtenido el rango A en 20 misiones.

displayName.japanese: 帝国が最も恐れる部隊

description.english: Obtained A ranks on all missions.
description.french: A obtenu le rang A à la fin de toutes les missions.
description.german: Rang A in allen Missionen erreicht.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto il rango A in tutte le missioni.
description.japanese: すべてのミッションをSランクでクリアした。
description.russian: Obtained A ranks on all missions.
description.spanish: Has obtenido el rango A en todas las misiones.

displayName.japanese: ダメージコントロール

description.english: Completed 10 missions without anyone in critical condition.
description.french: A terminé 10 missions sans avoir d'unités dans un état critique.
description.italian: Hai completato 10 missioni senza avere unità in condizioni critiche.
description.japanese: 瀕死者を出さずに10回ミッションをクリアした。
description.russian: Completed 10 missions without anyone in critical condition.
description.schinese: 在没有任何人员陷入濒死状态条件下完成10个任务。
description.spanish: Has cumplido 10 misiones sin nadie en condición crítica.
description.tchinese: 在沒有任何人員陷入瀕死狀態下完成10次任務

description.english: Gave ship orders 15 times.
description.french: A donné 15 fois des ordres aux navires.
description.italian: Hai dato ordini navali 15 volte.
description.japanese: シップオーダーを15回使用した。
description.russian: Gave ship orders 15 times.
description.spanish: Has dado órdenes navales 15 veces.

description.english: Gave direct commands 15 times.
description.french: A donné 15 fois des instructions directes.
description.italian: Hai dato comandi diretti 15 volte.
description.japanese: 直接指揮を15回使用した。
description.russian: Gave direct commands 15 times.
description.spanish: Has dado órdenes directas 15 veces.

description.english: Gave orders 15 times.
description.french: A donné 15 fois des ordres.
description.italian: Hai dato ordini 15 volte.
description.japanese: オーダーを15回使用した。
description.russian: Gave orders 15 times.
description.spanish: Has dado órdenes 15 veces.

description.english: Triggered a Last Stand 15 times.
description.french: A effectué 15 barouds d'honneur.
description.italian: Hai fatto scattare Ultima resistenza 15 volte.
description.japanese: ブレイブを15回発生させた。
description.russian: Triggered a Last Stand 15 times.
description.spanish: Has activado una Última Batalla 15 veces.
